name: MathMiner
0:
”Alexa, launch math miner”
”Start”
”My answer is seven”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math miner
des:
You and Alexa are on Mars mining gems from the Red planet. You will be asked a series of increasingly difficult addition and subtraction questions to drill deeper into the planet. As you dig deeper, you will find rare gems. Occasionally you will get stuck and need to answer a challenge question to break through the hard crust. Collect gems and try to reach greater depths each day!

Audio derived from Crawdad Stomp - Josh Kirsch/Media Right Productions
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
